title: Obari
author: Obari
content: I’ve gone through other local boards but those that might require me to use a google translate to be able to get what they’re saying and I’ve come to realize that a lot of these local boards are doing a lot of works to bringing other informations from other boards to their local boards so it will be possible for other members in their local board to get the information and I think this is one way to boost the growth of a community and at such I think not will be nice to report other vital informations from other boards to the local board here.What do you guys think about this and is this very thread appropriate to report other important informations ?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: November 23, 2023, 01:17:34 PMLast edit: November 23, 2023, 01:33:00 PM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on November 23, 2023, 12:35:16 PMWhat do you guys think about this and is this very thread appropriate to report other important informations ?This is a nice idea. Will you create a new thread about it or use this thread for it so that I can put this on notification.But also if someone create a new thread about it, if is very important, it is also not bad. Because a thread is existing on the English board, that does not mean it can not exist on local board. I have done this in the past but I am lazy to do it recently.Example of recently ones are:[WARNING] Another Electrum fake app on AppStore!!![SCAM] Fake transaction accelerator that requires typing your seed phrase!!! Avoid trading crypto in real person. You can see this now on Binance.I am definitely certain that some people did not see these important threads. If brought to local board, it would be good for more people to know about it and also discuss about it.Quote from: Hewlet on November 23, 2023, 01:07:46 PMI believe say something like that no go be bad thing but e go make sense say if we want do am make we use pigin take write am for our local board make e take show the nija vibs. Use any language that you want. The most important thing is for people to be able to see it and gain from it.EditThe languages I am referring to is either English or Pidgin English.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: This nah good suggestion and e go make sense if e happen but I wan ask; e go get a specific amount of topics wey go dey dropped or nah everything pipo deem as "important?". Reason I ask be say some fit decide to spam the thread as how Mr A dey regard thread wey dey important go differ from Mr B. Also,instead of doing bringing those threads to the local board, why not leave am as e dey for there? Because those wey dey ignore am for the other boards fit ignore am here too..how you see am?

comments.body: Na very good idea to bring important thread come our local board because bringing it here some people go feel free to shook their mouth for the matter the way them see ahm. Doing this is as if you they carry every body along,  one thing I observe from this our local board is that we wey belong here we they feel so free to discuss. This thing na the thing other local board they do and the thing they benefit them a lot . If complicated thread are brought in here and explain in our own language the thing go make sense wella.

Any topic wey dey general board wey go dey very beneficial for us here, e get need make we dey report dem for here. But my question be say, since na local board be dis, we need convert am to pidgin before bringing am come here or we go leave am as English, If na for general board we see am, since we dey understand English for here too and to save d stress of translating it into pidgin again? If not, dis idea na good one and I dey in support of am wella. Just bring idea on how you wan take achieve am, so dat oda members go put mouth inside am for you on how you go take run am.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: I know alot of people must have wondered why I haven't created the thread yet, I'm so sorry for the late response as there were alot of engagement for the weekend and I also lost a close one today so was very busy with burial and I plead you all bear with me as I would prepare and make the thread available hopefully before the end of tomorrow.Thanks all for your understanding  and cooperation.
